        • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public Set<String> getAbiFilters()

          Returns the list of ABI filters used for multi-apk.

          null value is allowed, indicating the need to generate an apk with all abis.

          Returns:
          a set of filters.

        • public DensitySplitOptions getDensity()

          Density settings.

        • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public Set<String> getDensityFilters()

          Returns the list of Density filters used for multi-apk.

          null value is allowed, indicating the need to generate an apk with all densities.

          Returns:
          a set of filters.

        • public LanguageSplitOptions getLanguage()

          Language settings.

        • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public Set<String> getLanguageFilters()

          Returns the list of language filters used for multi-apk. <>null value is allowed, indicating the need to generate an apk with all languages.

          Returns:
          a set of language filters.

        • public void language(org.gradle.api.Action<LanguageSplitOptions> action)

          Configures the language split settings.
